channel.title: Hello..i need help please
channel.description:
hello i need help with my laptop, i dont know what went wrong but when i turn it on, log on to a user everything loads, then after about 20-30 seconds it freezes, my mouse dont move or anything, my screen just freezes. i dont got a clue what went wrong, but i cant even use my laptop any more..(also i tryed doing alt/ctrl/delete, deleted a lot of stuff, and it worked, never froze, but it some times dont work)
so i am wondering if i got a virus? or whats wrong? how can i fix my laptop, please help.

item.title: Hello..i need help please

item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

[quote=“haxerownsmopar, post:12, topic:151436”]it loads on startup
in safemode most startup calls are disabled[/quote]what do u mean? what do i do because it is still not working… but some times it works when i press alt/ctrl/delete and delete most of the stuff thats over 10,000k, some times it works then,but does anyone got any idea how to fix my problem?

Read full topic

eeek dont system restore

item.title: Hello..i need help please
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Yes you can make your computer go back to a certain date, click start -> all programs -> accesories -> system tools -> system restore

When you’re at system restore click any date and you’re computer will restore back to that date

Read full topic
